name: Warlords III: Darklords Rising
notes:
Wine gives often gives a 'low system memory' warning on startup.  But the game seems to run fine.

I couldn't get it working fullscreen well. With a Protonified Wine, the game can run fullscreen but seems to run slow and the mouse cursor flashes.  Works fine with Wine 5.0 running in a smaller window.
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Warlords 3/Darklord.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
